meta.name: Century 21 Goodwin Int'l 世紀21奇豐國際
meta.about: 世紀21奇豐成立30多年,超過25間分店遍佈全港,而世紀21奇豐(國際)物業世紀21奇豐國際與全球多間著名海外發展商建立深厚的合作夥伴關係，公司的銷售範圍覆蓋英國、澳洲、加拿大、台灣、大灣區、馬來西亞、新加坡及泰國物業，為客戶提供專業、優質及全方位的海外物業銷售服務。

meta.name: C21 Goodwin International
meta.about: We are the international property consultants in Hong Kong. Focus on UK , Australia, Canada and Greater Bay China property market.

meta.name: C21 International
meta.about:
Century 21 Goodwin (International) Property Consultants in 2018, effectively expanding our property business overseas and to the Greater Bay Area. Currently, we have formed a professional oversea property consultant team to offering one to one consultation service to our potential buyer. Giving a large support from our local sales team of over 170 sales agents, we achieved a huge result last year. In 2019, we sold more than 100 properties overseas and in the Greater Bay Area, reaching an impressive sum of over HK$150 million.

Furthermore, Century 21 Goodwin (International) boasts a comprehensive marketing network that includes financial planners, mortgage brokers, accountants, lawyers, international marketing agencies, and overseas professional network. This network provides developers with customized marketing strategies to maximize sales target in the shortest time frame.
